Module camstesting
Package suggestion

Class SuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
suggestion.SuggestionManager
public class SuggestionManager extends Object
This class serves as an abstraction that handles the reading of data from suggestions.txt Database
Since:
24 nov 2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
group1
